sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: It was 100 years ago that Ireland's civil war ended. The date was celebrated with a military ceremony in Dublin attended by the Prime Minister, or Taoiseach Leo Varadkar, and the Deputy Prime Minister, or Tánaiste, Micheál Martin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The Irish Civil War, fought between 1922 and 1923, followed the War of Independence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: About 2,000 people died in the conflict, including Michael Collins, considered the leading figure in the Irish struggle for independence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Several of them were injured.

sentences.sentence: The private hired vessel capsized late on Sunday afternoon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Regional officials said bad weather conditions could have caused the incident.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Italian Deputy Prime Minister Matteo Salvini praised the rescuers, saying their quick actions prevented what could have been a much more tragic outcome.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Chelsea have confirmed Maurizio Pochettino as the club's new manager. The 51-year-old

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: has signed a two-year contract with the side, keeping him there until 2026.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The Argentine coach will be tasked with getting a tune out of an expensively assembled squad that finished 12th in this season's Premier League.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Chelsea spent an eye-watering 690 million euros on players last season alone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Pochettino is no stranger to London after spending a five and a half year spell with north London side Tottenham Hotspurs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: It will be his first coaching role since last July when he left Paris Saint-Germain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: He becomes Chelsea's sixth permanent manager in five years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The club parted ways with both Thomas Tuchel and Graeme Potter during the 2022-2023 season.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Former Chelsea player and manager Frank Lampard filled in for Potter in an interim role.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Lampard recorded only one win in 11 competitive matches.
